verses.verse: And Joseph <WH3130> was brought down <WH3381> to Egypt; <WH4714> and Potiphar, <WH6318> an officer <WH5631> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> captain <WH8269> of the guard, <WH2876> an Egyptian, <WH376> <WH4713> bought <WH7069> him of the hands <WH4480> <WH3027> of the Ishmaelites, <WH3459> which <WH834> had brought him down <WH3381> thither. <WH8033>

And the LORD <WH3068> was <WH1961> with <WH854> Joseph, <WH3130> and he was <WH1961> a prosperous <WH6743> man; <WH376> and he was <WH1961> in the house <WH1004> of his master <WH113> the Egyptian. <WH4713>

And his master <WH113> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> was with <WH854> him, and that the LORD <WH3068> made all <WH3605> that <WH834> he <WH1931> did <WH6213> to prosper <WH6743> in his hand. <WH3027>

And Joseph <WH3130> found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in his sight, <WH5869> and he served <WH8334> him: and he made him overseer <WH6485> over <WH5921> his house, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> that he had <WH3426> he put <WH5414> into his hand. <WH3027>

And it came to pass <WH1961> from the time <WH4480> <WH227> that he had made him overseer <WH6485> <WH853> in his house, <WH1004> and over <WH5921> all <WH3605> that <WH834> he had, <WH3426> that the LORD <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> <WH853> the Egyptian's <WH4713> house <WH1004> for Joseph's sake; <WH1558> <WH3130> and the blessing <WH1293> of the LORD <WH3068> was <WH1961> upon all <WH3605> that <WH834> he had <WH3426> in the house, <WH1004> and in the field. <WH7704>

And he left <WH5800> all <WH3605> that <WH834> he had in Joseph's <WH3130> hand; <WH3027> and he knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> aught <WH3972> he had, <WH854> save <WH3588> <WH518> the bread <WH3899> which <WH834> he <WH1931> did eat. <WH398> And Joseph <WH3130> was <WH1961> a goodly <WH3303> <WH8389> person, and well <WH3303> favored. <WH4758>

And it came to pass <WH1961> after <WH310> these <WH428> things, <WH1697> that his master's <WH113> wife <WH802> cast <WH5375> <WH853> her eyes <WH5869> upon <WH413> Joseph; <WH3130> and she said, <WH559> Lie <WH7901> with <WH5973> me.

But he refused, <WH3985> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> his master's <WH113> wife, <WH802> Behold, <WH2005> my master <WH113> knoweth <WH3045> not <WH3808> what <WH4100> is with <WH854> me in the house, <WH1004> and he hath committed <WH5414> all <WH3605> that <WH834> he hath <WH3426> to my hand; <WH3027>

There is none <WH369> greater <WH1419> in this <WH2088> house <WH1004> than <WH4480> I; neither <WH3808> hath he kept back <WH2820> any thing <WH3972> from <WH4480> me but <WH3588> <WH518> thee, because <WH834> thou <WH859> art his wife: <WH802> how <WH349> then can I do <WH6213> this <WH2063> great <WH1419> wickedness, <WH7451> and sin <WH2398> against God? <WH430>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> as she spoke <WH1696> to <WH413> Joseph <WH3130> day <WH3117> by day, <WH3117> that he hearkened <WH8085> not <WH3808> unto <WH413> her, to lie <WH7901> by <WH681> her, or to be <WH1961> with <WH5973> her.

And it came to pass <WH1961> about this <WH2088> time, <WH3117> that Joseph went <WH935> into the house <WH1004> to do <WH6213> his business; <WH4399> and there was none <WH369> <WH376> of the men <WH4480> <WH376> of the house <WH1004> there <WH8033> within. <WH1004>

And she caught <WH8610> him by his garment, <WH899> saying, <WH559> Lie <WH7901> with <WH5973> me: and he left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> in her hand, <WH3027> and fled, <WH5127> and got <WH3318> him out. <WH2351>
And it came to pass, <WH1961> when she saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> he had left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> in her hand, <WH3027> and was fled <WH5127> forth, <WH2351>

That she called <WH7121> unto the men <WH376> of her house, <WH1004> and spoke <WH559> unto them, saying, <WH559> See, <WH7200> he hath brought in <WH935> a Hebrew <WH376> <WH5680> unto us to mock <WH6711> us; he came in <WH935> unto <WH413> me to lie <WH7901> with <WH5973> me, and I cried <WH7121> with a loud <WH1419> voice: <WH6963>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when he heard <WH8085> that <WH3588> I lifted up <WH7311> my voice <WH6963> and cried, <WH7121> that he left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> with <WH681> me, and fled, <WH5127> and got <WH3318> him out. <WH2351>
And she laid up <WH5117> his garment <WH899> by <WH681> her, until <WH5704> his lord <WH113> came <WH935> <WH413> home. <WH1004>

And she spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> him according to these <WH428> words, <WH1697> saying, <WH559> The Hebrew <WH5680> servant, <WH5650> which <WH834> thou hast brought <WH935> unto us, came in <WH935> unto <WH413> me to mock <WH6711> me:
And it came to pass, <WH1961> as I lifted up <WH7311> my voice <WH6963> and cried, <WH7121> that he left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> with <WH681> me, and fled <WH5127> out. <WH2351>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when his master <WH113> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of his wife, <WH802> which <WH834> she spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> him, saying, <WH559> After this <WH428> manner <WH1697> did <WH6213> thy servant <WH5650> to me; that his wrath <WH639> was kindled. <WH2734>

And Joseph's <WH3130> master <WH113> took <WH3947> him, and put <WH5414> him into <WH413> the prison, <WH1004> <WH5470> a place <WH4725> where <WH834> the king's <WH4428> prisoners <WH615> were bound: <WH631> and he was <WH1961> there <WH8033> in the prison. <WH1004> <WH5470>

But the LORD <WH3068> was <WH1961> with <WH854> Joseph, <WH3130> and showed <WH5186> <WH413> him mercy, <WH2617> and gave <WH5414> him favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the keeper <WH8269> of the prison. <WH1004> <WH5470>

And the keeper <WH8269> of the prison <WH1004> <WH5470> committed <WH5414> to Joseph's <WH3130> hand <WH3027> <WH853> all <WH3605> the prisoners <WH615> that <WH834> were in the prison; <WH1004> <WH5470> and whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> they did <WH6213> there, <WH8033> he <WH1931> was <WH1961> the doer <WH6213> of it.

The keeper <WH8269> of the prison <WH1004> <WH5470> looked <WH7200> not <WH369> to <WH853> any thing <WH3605> <WH3972> that was under his hand; <WH3027> because <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> was with <WH854> him, and that which <WH834> he <WH1931> did, <WH6213> the LORD <WH3068> made it to prosper. <WH6743>
